/usr/local/openmpi/4.1.0/gcc/bin/mpicc -fPIC -m64 -fPIC -w -O3 -DNDEBUG -m64 -shared -Wl,-soname,libadios2_dill.so.2 -o ../../../lib64/libadios2_dill.so.2.4.1 CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill_util.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill_pkg.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill_cplus.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill_virtual.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/virtual.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/vm.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/dill_x86_64.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/x86_64.c.o CMakeFiles/dill.dir/x86_64_rt.c.o  -Wl,-rpath,:::::::::::::::: -lffi
